class.name: robot_array_rviz_plugins/SingleRobotStateArray
class.description: Display an array of single robots (i.e., robots with the same URDF model) from messages of robot_array_msgs/RobotStateArray.

class.name: robot_array_rviz_plugins/MultiRobotStateArray
class.description: Display an array of multiple types of robots (i.e., robots with different URDF models) from messages of robot_array_msgs/RobotStateArray.
